comment.caption: Grandview Farmhouse
comment.note: Old photo of the Grandview farmhouse, a distance view of the house from the front. The rose arbor is visible as well as several of the large trees leading up to the house. The fence and farm buildings to the left of the house are also visible. The original photograph is owned by J. C. Truman, who lent it to the Library for copying in May, 1983.
